item.title: Accel and Prosus team up to back early-stage Indian startups
item.description: Prosus will match Accel's investment in Indian startups under this partnership.

item.title: Ads might be coming to Apple Maps next year
item.description: This could be part of a larger strategy to introduce more advertising in iOS.

item.title: Trump and Xi will ‘consummate’ TikTok deal on Thursday, treasury secretary says
item.description: The United States and China are ready to move forward on a TikTok deal, according to Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: The ‘robot army’ argument
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.
